msbt.message: Nothing jump kicks the sleepy right out of your brain like coffee.<10_4 /> GET! HYPED! FOR! COFFEEEEEEEEE!
Sometimes, when I can't wake up in the morning, I run in circles and scream really loud for a few minutes!
To be totes honest? This is the time of day when I get the sleepiest!
Hmm What should I do tonight?
The sunset is SO le beaut and SO romanticit makes me all soppy!
My sched for tonight is paaacked! There's a monster movie on TV, video games to play, music to blastIt might just be an all-nighter!
I'm out for a late-night spooky stroll. It's not very spooky so far, but you'll hear me scream if that changes!
The morning sun totes gives a really fun vibe
Did you know the moon is about 235,000 miles away?I'm going to walk around the shore until I've walked that far.Just call me Moon !

Clear skies are amazing. They really make you think about how huge our galaxy is, you know?Like, sunlight travels 92 million miles to make us warm and happy during the day!And, at night, some of the star light we see has traveled billions of years to get here to our islandI want to make a joke about me being a star, but I'm too busy being amazed by nature.
The petals are so pretty! Being surrounded by dancing flowersit's like I'm a PRINCESS!
Cloudy days are wild. It's like someone built a blanket fort over the whole world.
Snow does fab things for my inner- peacefulness levels. But why does it have to be SO TOTES COLD?
Doesn't look très pretty in the snow, ?
Don't you think I really pull off the whole "drenched by rain" look?
Rainy days are PERFECTO for going outside! Staying inside and being dry would be SUCH a waste!
The rain on tastes kind of like , don't you think, ?
I love all the amazing discoveries I make on my walks! Like cute flowers! And places to hide things
Sunny days are my absolute fave. On a sunny day, it feels like anything is possible!
Ooh! A petal on my head! ! Make a wish!
It's cloudy. I'm not a fan.<10_4 /> But you know what? Clouds aren't so bad if you talk about them with friends.
Snowy walks are super fun once you remember you need to dress warm!
I built a snowperson that's cold to the touch, but it's so fluffy and adorbs I just want to hug it!
Did you know clouds are mostly water? So when it rains, it's kind of like the sky is falling, huh?
Aren't I just so extra glam on rainy days?
Rainy days are great days to stay home and bake cookies, or watch TV, or just casually stay dry.
Hiiii, Are you here to hang out with me?
Don't you love being outside when it's sunny? We need to have a picnic sometime!
The flowers are sooo pretty! It's like they're celebrating our friendship or whatever!
Being outside when it's cloudy is actually kind of greatfeels too dark when I'm indoors.
Don't catch a cold in this snow, 'K, ? And if you do catch a cold, let it go!
Have you ever seen a snowflake up close, ? They're all different—and all adorbs!
Sometimes it's fun to stand out in the rain and scream at the sky.<10_4 /> I said "fun," right? I sold that idea?
Rainy days feel like the sky is throwing a party just for me! Oh, and everyone else too
I should throw a rainy-day party sometime. We could all come dressed as our favorite clouds.
I'm practicing striking aPOSE! It's an important life skill. Never know when you might need toPOSE!
I was, like, waaay into this walk, but then it started to get boring. Then I found you, and it's fab again!
I'm just walking around the island. You know, getting my face out there, building my brand, being famous!
Hi. I lost my voice. I was trying to be a heavy-metal singer. Instead of a pop star I am SO not metal.
Guess what I want to tell you! Oneyou're fab. <10_4 />TwoI mean that.<10_4 /> Threethere is no three!
Guess what! I was playing single- player hide-and-seek, and I won!<10_4 /> I am so bored.
